titlestmt.titleproper: Register to the Sylvia Fine and Danny Kaye Musical Comedy Library
Fine (Sylvia) and Danny Kaye Musical Comedy Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 00:01

did.unittitle: Sylvia Fine and Danny Kaye Musical Comedy Library
did.abstract: Scores, sheet music, lyrics, and librettos belonging to Sylvia Fine and Danny Kaye

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to researchers by appointment. There are no restricted materials in the collection. Please contact the Special Collections staff to schedule an appointment.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Sylvia Fine and Danny Kaye Musical Comedy Library is the physical property of the Irving S. Gilmore Music Library of Yale University. Copyrights belong to the composers and authors, or their legal heirs and assigns.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: MSS 108, The Sylvia Fine and Danny Kaye Musical Comedy Library in the Irving S. Gilmore Music Library of Yale University.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Researchers interested in Fine and Kaye may also wish to consult the Danny Kaye and Sylvia Fine Collection at Music Division of the Library of Congress. That collection contains the bulk of their personal papers.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Danny Kaye (born David Daniel Kaminsky in 1913) ranks among the most talented and versatile stars of Broadway, Hollywood, radio and television; he was admired for his acting, singing, dancing, and comedy. His many films included The Secret Life of Walter Mitty and The Inspector General. He died in 1987.

In 1940 Kaye married Sylvia Fine (1913-1991), a lyricist and composer. She wrote many of her songs for Kaye and helped manage his career, and she was a successful movie and TV producer in her own right.
Fine and Kaye had one daughter, Dena Kaye.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection includes published or typescript scores, sheet music, lyrics, librettos and other materials from the collection of Sylvia Fine and Danny Kaye.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into four series: I. Lyrics and scores. II. Extra copies. III. Sheet music, copies and piano conductor's score. IV. Inventory.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains a detailed description of the contents of the collection. Also includes information about sound recordings, which are not part of the collection at Yale.
